venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
A beautiful backroads ride to The Butterfly Place In Westford, MA

See New England butterflies and tropical species from all over the world. Walk along a winding pathway. Observe butterflies sipping from flowers, basking in the sunshine and flying freely in a natural habitat. Enjoy our koi fish and quail birds which live among the butterflies. Visit the “show and tell bench” where a staff member is always available to answer your questions and help make your visit fun. See eggs, caterpillars or other interesting creatures up close.

$12 ADMISSION

Click here: The Butterfly Place - Westford, Massachusetts: An indoor garden filled with hundreds of free-flying butterflies!

 

Meeting time:  9 am 

                     Ride leaves at 930 am

Meeting Location:  Dunkin Donuts in Randolph

1395 N Main st Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA
